mapper.select: select userno ,avg(recordhints)avgHints ,avg(recordtime) avgClearTime ,count(*) totalGame ,(SELECT count(*) FROM record where recordhints=0 and userno = #{userNo}) nohintgame ,(SELECT count(*) FROM record where recordclear='success' and userno = #{userNo}) wongame from record where userno = #{userNo} group by userno
mapper.update: update rankrating set USERRATING = #{rankRating}, winrate = #{winRate}, nohintwinrate = #{noHintWinRate}, showAvgClearTime = #{showAvgClearTime}, gamehistory = #{gameHistory} where userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.select: select u.nickname ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.userrating DESC) rank ,r.userno ,r.winrate ,r.nohintwinrate ,r.showavgcleartime ,r.gamehistory from rankrating r,users u where r.userno=u.userno
